name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIpex —— Tab & History Manager, AI Companion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Chrome with commands, shortcuts, and AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful Tab Management

🗄 Seamlessly switch, open, close, and search your tabs with AIpex's tab manager. Restore closed tabs and utilize AI-powered tab organization to keep your workspace tidy and organized.
Comprehensive Browsing History and Bookmarks

📚 Browse and manage your bookmarks with ease. 🔍 Quickly search your browsing history to find the information you need.

Boost Your Productivity

⚡️ Leverage over 50 actions to improve your productivity, from muting and pinning tabs to advanced bookmarking shortcuts.

AI-Powered Chatbot Sidebar

🤖 Elevate your browsing experience with the integrated AI chatbot sidebar. Engage in continuous conversations, ask the chatbot to translate text, summarize web pages or videos, and even perform web searches - all without leaving your browser.

Customizable and Integrative

🔮 Use special commands to filter and perform more actions. 🧩 Seamlessly integrate with popular tools like Notion, Figma, and Docs.

Versatile and Adaptable

⚙️ Adjust advanced settings to help troubleshoot browsing issues. 🌙 Switch between dark and light modes to suit your preferences.

Operate Like Arc

⭐ Enjoy a browsing experience that mimics the popular Arc browser, with a focus on efficiency and productivity.
